name: Feature Add-Ons For Booked
author: Alvin Muthui

sections.description:
Extend Your Appointments List View and Export Options

This plugin gives you the option to view all your appointments in a paginated format. The plugin also removes the 500 export limit to the ability to export everything.
Booked Appointments plugin must be installed and activated to use this plugin.

Features

  • Paginated Appointments List View
  • Unlimited Exports and a few additional options
sections.installation:
1. Go to plugins in your dashboard and select ‘add new’.
  2. Search for feature-add-ons-for-booked.zip and install it.
  3. Go to your Dashboard > Appointments. All Appointments and Export submenu are now added.
sections.faq:
Can I export all the appointments?

Yes, with this addon you will be able to export all appointments.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • First Version

1.0.1

  • Fixed: In WordPress Admin-> Appointments-> Export, you can filter posts by calendar.
  • Fixed: Notice undefined variable: date_start
